-- DaoM_Workflow_S2_Select -- 2014/7/18 日立 太郎 SELECT [Id], [SubSystemId], [WorkflowName], [WfPositionId], [WorkflowNo], [FromUserId], [ActionType], [ToUserId], [ToUserPositionTitlesId], [NextWfPositionId], [NextWorkflowNo], [CorrespondOfReplyWorkflow], [MailTemplateId], [ReserveArea] FROM [M_Workflow]
WHERE [Id] = @Id
